column3: Here's a proposed alternative - representing these values as int64_t internally, and only converting to double at the time of display. Motivated by a general distrust of floating point and a desire to minimize the points at which it's used:\nhttps://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/compare/master...Empact:2020-03-ping-time
Concept ACK on fixing but I prefer @Empact's approach :)
From a quick look and comparison I also prefer @Empact approach.
